nodes.text: Thiafeña was an astronomical object located in the Mid Rim. During the reign of the Galactic Republic, Thiafeña produced foodstuff. As one of the Mid Rim locations included in the the Mid Rim Cooperation motion, introduced to the Galactic Senate by Senator Padmé Amidala in 28 BBY, Thiafeña was assigned to provide food to Bromlarch, a planet stricken by groundquakes.
Thiafeña was mentioned in Queen's Shadow, a 2019 novel written by E. K. Johnston.
